challenge.title: Jean Kilbourne and Jackson Katz - Spin the Bottle
challenge.description: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Spin the Bottle from MediaEd, exploring the alcohol industry's advertising campaigns attempting to make a deadly product cool.
challenge.instructions: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Spin the Bottle on MediaEd's website. Click "Watch Full Length Preview." Requires an email address.
